Default port used by client (may be changed).

When send by client: request deletion of file on server.

delete a single file from the server.

Delimiter used to separate arguments sent over the network.

DISCOVER - Static variable in class protocol.FileTransferProtocol
When send by client: Discover server in local network.
discoverLocalAddress() - Static method in class network.NetworkLayer
Discover network address of localhost, using a more advanced method, to find the preferred network interface.
discoverServer() - Method in class client.FileTransferClient
Find a server network address using broadcast of a DISCOVER packet, and set server to found server.
DOWNLOAD - Static variable in class protocol.FileTransferProtocol
When send by client: request download of file from server.

DOWNLOAD_SINGLE - Static variable in class userInterface.TUICommands
download a single file from the server.
DownloadHelper - Class in helpers
DownloadHelper to download a file
DownloadHelper(Object, DatagramSocket, InetAddress, int, long, File, int) - Constructor for class helpers.DownloadHelper
Create a new UploadHelper, and initialise instance variables.
downloadSingle(File, int) - Method in class server.FileTransferClientHandler
Download a single file from the server to the client.
downloadSingleFile(File) - Method in class client.FileTransferClient
